content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Used to convert iron ore into iron plates. The agent retrieved this furnace to enable smelting operations.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Used to convert copper ore into copper plates. The agent accessed this furnace during copper plate production.


ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Errors related to API calls (get_entities):
  – Use the correct function signature by not passing unexpected keyword arguments (for example, avoid using “radius” when not supported).
  – If multiple positional arguments are required, ensure they exactly match the API’s definition.
  – Always verify that a returned entity list is not None before iterating over it.

• Errors during Lab placement and crafting:
  – Confirm that the required inventory items are available before attempting to place a Lab (e.g., verify that a Lab is actually in the inventory).
  – Ensure that all sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are sufficiently available or pre-produced before initiating Lab crafting.

• Errors when supplying Automation Science Packs:
  – Guarantee that the target Lab structure exists on the map before attempting to supply it with science packs; otherwise, resource efforts will be in vain.
